content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property the applicant was awarded an apartment and a car and the defendant was ordered to pay compensation to the applicant the court recognized creditorial obligations with a bank which will be the responsibility of the applicant the court also acknowledged separate debts owed by the defendant to other parties the legal text discusses the division of property between spouses and references specific articles related to property division the applicant filed for the dissolution of the marriage and requested various orders including child maintenance and establishment of rights regarding the children the court granted some of the applicants requests divided the joint property and addressed credit obligations and personal liabilities the court ordered the defendant to pay the costs of the proceedings and exempted the applicant from certain stamp duty fees the court also upheld the applicants claim for child maintenance and awarded compensation for maintenance arrears the court allowed the party to dissolve their marriage and awarded specific assets to the applicant the court determined the responsibility for credit obligations and declared separate debts owed by the defendant the court dismissed some of the application and ordered both parties to pay various costs and stamp duty fees

metadata.cost: 2'556.00 EUR(professional fees) + 179.80 EUR (stamp duty) + 5.11 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the applicant
metadata.financial_support: EUR 200 per month for each of the children
